titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the Right Honourable William Lenthall, Esquire, Speaker to the Honourable House of Commons: concerning the raising of the siege of Taunton by the Parliaments forces. / By a worthy gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax his army. Ordered that the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Worthy Gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax His Army.

titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the Right Honourable William Lenthall, Esquire, Speaker to the Honourable House of Commons: concerning the raising of the siege of Taunton by the Parliaments forces. / By a worthy gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax his army. Ordered that the Commons assembled in Parliament, that this letter be forthwith printed and published. H: Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: Worthy Gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax His Army.
Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husbands printer to the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
